pullrequest.title: Pose frame semantics: describe legacy behavior

content.raw:
Super minor: The Ruby Markdown parser is combing these all into the same `<code/>` HTML tag.

Is there a 2-second solution to separate this? If so, no bigs.

\(This is the 3rd time I’ve written this comment… I am _really_ starting to dislike Bitbucket for losing my text if I click off…\)
